name: AVContentKeySessionDelegate
desc: A protocol that handles content key requests.

items.name: func contentKeySession(AVContentKeySession, didProvide: AVContentKeyRequest)
items.desc: Provides the receiver with a new content key request object.

items.name: func contentKeySession(AVContentKeySession, didProvideRenewingContentKeyRequest: AVContentKeyRequest)
items.desc: Provides the receiver with a new content key request object for the renewal of an existing content key.

items.name: func contentKeySession(AVContentKeySession, didProvide: AVPersistableContentKeyRequest)
items.desc: Provides the receiver with a new content key request object to process a persistable content key.

items.name: func contentKeySession(AVContentKeySession, didUpdatePersistableContentKey: Data, forContentKeyIdentifier: Any)
items.desc: Provides the receiver with an updated persistable content key for a specific key request.

items.name: func contentKeySession(AVContentKeySession, shouldRetry: AVContentKeyRequest, reason: AVContentKeyRequest.RetryReason) -> Bool
items.desc: Provides the receiver with a content key request object to retry.

items.name: struct AVContentKeyRequest.RetryReason
items.desc: The reason for asking the client to retry a content key request.

items.name: func contentKeySessionContentProtectionSessionIdentifierDidChange(AVContentKeySession)
items.desc: Tells the receiver the content protection session identifier changed.

items.name: func contentKeySession(AVContentKeySession, contentKeyRequest: AVContentKeyRequest, didFailWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the receiver that the content key request failed.

items.name: func contentKeySession(AVContentKeySession, contentKeyRequestDidSucceed: AVContentKeyRequest)
items.desc: Tells the content key session that the response to a content key requeset was successfully processed.

items.name: func contentKeySessionDidGenerateExpiredSessionReport(AVContentKeySession)
items.desc: Notifies the sender that an expired session report has been generated.
